item.title: Scrabble Course Project Csc207
item.description: In 2022, my team created a re-write of Scrabble. For all the details, visit our team site here: https://github.com/CSC207-2022F-UofT/course-project-scrabble. Overall, the project was very exciting and my team had a lot of fun. I’ve attached our Readme.md below in case we missed it. Alongside the PDF explaining our software design. I was mainly responsible for the UI design. PDF of software design: download the pdf here Scrabble Welcome to Scrabble, a game played and loved by millions around the world.
